title: caffe.proto missing
body_html:
I installed the CPU only version on Ubuntu with conda install -c caffe2 caffe2.

caffe_translator.py is broken because caffe.proto is missing.

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/root/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", mod_spec)
  File "/root/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)
  File "/root/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe_translator.py", line 12, in <module>
    from caffe.proto import caffe_pb2
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'caffe'

caffe_translator.py is broken because caffe.proto is missing.

body:
I installed the CPU only version on Ubuntu with `conda install -c caffe2 caffe2`.

`caffe_translator.py` is broken because [caffe.proto](https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/tree/master/caffe/proto) is missing.

    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "/root/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
        "__main__", mod_spec)
      File "/root/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
        exec(code, run_globals)
      File "/root/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe_translator.py", line 12, in <module>
        from caffe.proto import caffe_pb2
    ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'caffe'
